item.title: Friendships, Relationships - How do you nurture them?
item.description: In our lives, we encounter various individuals, each occupying a different place in our social circles: friends, family, colleagues, acquaintances. Whether consciously or subconsciously, we categorize these relationships into tiers: close friends, acquaintances, and so forth. What criteria do you use to distinguish between a friend and an acquaintance? For many, the duration of acquaintance often plays a significant role; our closest bonds often stem from spending time during our school or college years.
